Name: Theres a precious hiding place
ChorusText:
There’s a shelter
from all sin
from all doubt
and from all fear
all the world
may enter in
precious place
in Jesus side
There’s a shelter
from all sin
from all doubt
and from all fear
all the world
may enter in
precious place
in Jesus side
There’s a precious hiding place
in Jesus side x 2
there’s a cleft of heavenly grace
in Jesus side x 2
When
i
get to
that hiding place
my weary soul
will find rest
then
i
will join
the heavenly band
by Jesus’ side x 2
There’s a shelter
from all sin
from all doubt
and from all fear
all the world
may enter in
precious place
in Jesus side
This precious place
was bought for me
by Jesus’ blood
shed on the cross
He died for me
on Calvary
to set me free
and make me whole
